description.narrative: Output 6.1: Yemen Country Office (YCO) staff and partners have improved capacity to undertake equity- focused, gender- sensitive and evidence- informed planning and programming, which contributes to Cross Sectoral - Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 6: Government and other partners at central and governorate level are undertaking equity focused, and evidence informed planning, monitoring.

participating-org.narrative: GENERAL AUTHORITY FOR RURAL WATER PROJECTS LAHEJ
MINISTRY OF EDUCATION OFFICE HADRAMOUT COAST

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 6.1: YCO staff and partners have improved capacity to undertake equity- focused, gender- sensitive and evidence-informed planning and programming

description.narrative: PMR continued to provide technical support to the programme sections to ensure that strategic and operational programme planning and designing were grounded in RBM principles. In 2021, staff were equipped with knowledge on Rights & Result Based Management (RRBM) principles through trainings facilitated by UNICEF RRBM External Master Trainers. | Status:Met | As-of Date:16/01/2022
